item.title: InterMold Thailand 2023
item.description:
Dates: 
Jun 21, 2023 - Jun 24, 2023
Opening hours: 
10:00-18.00 hrs
Venue: 
BITEC - Bangkok International Trade & Exhibition Centre
Location address: 
88 Bangna-Trad Road, Bangna
Country: 
Thailand
Organizer: 
RX Tradex
Show URL: 
https://www.intermoldthailand.com
Number of exhibitors: 
50
Major exhibits: 

Machine for Mold & Die: Boring Machine, Drilling Machine, Finishing Machine, Grinding Machine, Metal-Cut-Off Machine, Milling Machine, Shaping, and Slotting & Broaching Machine.
Mold Material & Components: Crush, Die and Mold Parts, Die for Pressing, Injection, Mold Base, Pillar, Power Metallurgy, Steel, and Work Holding Device.
Machine Tool Accessory: Accessories & Attachment , Auxiliary Equipment, Machine Components, and Toold Holders.
Tools & Tooling: Cemented Carbide Tools, Ceramic, Cermet Tools, Cutting Tools, and Diamond & CBN Tools.
Precision Measuring Optical Measuring & Testing Machine & Instrument: 3D Co-ordinate Measuring Machine & Instrument, Angle Measuring Machine & Instrument, Digital Position Readout System, Gauge Length Measuring Machine, Surface Roughness Measuring Machine, Universal Measuring Microscope, and Universal Testing Machine.
Mold Repair & Maintenance: EDM Equipment, Hot Runner, Mold Repair, Mold Washing Machine, and Polishing Machine.
Mold Design & Engineering: 3D Measurement and Digitizing, 3D Printer, CAD/CAM/ CAE Software, Mold Design, Rapid Prototyping and Tooling, and Stimulation.

Show banner: 

ASEAN’s Most Comprehensive Exhibition on Mold & Mold Components Making Technology

To expand and sustain the growth of mold-making businesses, industrialists need to come together to get updated on latest technology and equipment and exchange ideas, connections, and business opportunities. “InterMold Thailand 2023” is where mold makers will be able to reconnect with their peers and industry leaders. Featuring over 250 brands of latest mold manufacturing, repair, and maintenance technology and equipment, including 3D printing technology, seminars, and networking opportunities, the event is a part of “Manufacturing Expo,” ASEAN’s leading machinery and technology for manufacturing and supporting industries consisting of five specializing events serving plastics, mold and die, auto-parts, industrial automation, and surface and coatings sectors, “InterMold Thailand” will be the most comprehensive annual gathering where mold-making community will come together and discover how they can power up their competitive edge and growth opportunities.

Show Contact
Title: 
Deputy Managing Director
Name: 
Mr. Suttisak Wilanan
Telephone: 
+662-6867299
Fax number: 
+662-6867288
E-mail: 
intermold@rxtradex.com
Mailing address: 
32nd fl., Sathorn Nakorn Tower, 100/68-69 North Sathon Road
City / State / Province: 
Bangkok
Country: 
Thailand

item.title: InterPlas Thailand 2023
item.description:
Dates: 
Jun 21, 2023 - Jun 24, 2023
Opening hours: 
10.00-18.00
Venue: 
BITEC (Bangkok International Trade Exhibition Center)
Location address: 
88th Bangna-Trad Road(KM.1), Bangna, Bangkok 10260
Country: 
Thailand
Organizer: 
RX Tradex
Show URL: 
https://www.interplasthailand.com
Number of exhibitors: 
50
Major exhibits: 

Machinery: Injection Molding Machine, Extrusion Machine, Blow Molding Machine & Plastic Packaging, Film Making Machine, Filling Machine, and Recycling Machine. Equipment: Air Compressor, Blade, Chiller, Heat Transfer, Marking and Printing, Nozzle, Pump & Valve, Rolls, Screw & Barrel, and Welding. Auxiliary: Blender. Conveying System, Drying, Dust Collector, Feeder, Granulator, Grinder, Hopper, and Vacuum Technology. Measuring, Control & Testing: Color, Tension, Density, Compression, and Dimension. Plastic Mold: CAD-CAM, Hot Runner Systems, Mold Changer, Mold Treatment & Maintenance, and Parts & Components. Chemical & Raw Materials: Additive, Adhesive & Glues, Bioplastics, Coating Compounds, Composites & High Performance Materials, Elastomer, Fillers, Pigment & Masterbatch, Resin, Semi-Finished Products, and Thermoplastic.

Show banner: 

ASEAN’s Most Comprehensive Exhibition on Technologies for Plastics Manufacturing

As plastics play vital roles in every part of life, plastic manufacturers encounter both opportunities and challenges in their adjustment to match the current dynamics.

At “InterPlas Thailand 2023,” the most comprehensive event for plastics manufacturing industry, manufacturers will discover new possibilities to power up their businesses, maximize their opportunities, and handle challenges with over 300 brands of latest machinery, recycling technologies, raw materials, and more. The event’s concurrent seminars and networking opportunities will open the floor for the industrialists to discuss BCG, productivity, and many other issues that could make a difference for their businesses. As a part of “Manufacturing Expo,” ASEAN’s leading machinery and technology for manufacturing and supporting industries consisting of five specializing events displaying plastics, mold and die, auto-parts, industrial automation, and surface and coatings technologies.

Show Contact
Title: 
Deputy Managing Director
Name: 
Mr. Suttisak Wilanan
Telephone: 
+66 2686 7299
Fax number: 
+66 2686 7288
E-mail: 
interplas@rxtradex.com
Mailing address: 
32nd fl., Sathorn Nakorn Tower, 100/68-69 North Sathon Rd., Silom , Bangrak, Bangkok 10500
City / State / Province: 
Bangkok
Country: 
Thailand

item.title: Automotive Manufacturing 2023
item.description:
Dates: 
Jun 21, 2023 - Jun 24, 2023
Opening hours: 
10.00-18.00
Venue: 
BITEC (Bangkok International Trade Exhibition Center)
Location address: 
88th Bangna-Trad Road(KM.1), Bangna, Bangkok 10260
Country: 
Thailand
Organizer: 
RX Tradex
Show URL: 
https://www.automanexpo.com
Number of exhibitors: 
50
Major exhibits: 

Automotive Special Equipment: Press Machine, Press Brake, Hydraulic Press, Mechanical Press, Fiber Laser Machine, Laser Cutting Machine, Water Jet Machine, Sawing machine, Bending Machine, Shearing Machine, Forging Machine, Washing Machine, Die Casting Machine, and Fasteners Machine. Automotive Parts and Components: Casting, Forging, Jig & Metal Forming, Polishing, and Heating. Automotive Welding : Arc Welding Machine, Gas Cutting Machine, Laser Welding Machine, Plasma Jet Cutting, Small Electric Welding Machine , Spot Welding Machine, Welding Electrode Material, and Welding Fume Exhauster. Automotive Material : High-strength Steel, Plate, Tubing and Bar of Automobile/ Aluminum, Magnesium, Titanium and Alloy Material, and Compound Material. Automotive Testing: Coordinator Measuring Machine, 3D-Coordinator Measuring Machine and Instrument, Control Measurement, Dimension Measuring Machine, Angle Machine & Instrument, Balancing Testing Machine, Digital Position Readout System, Gauge Length Measuring Machine, Vemier Caliper, Universal Measuring Microscope. Automotive Design: CAD/CAM/CAE Software, Engineering Design, IT Solution, 3D Printer. Automotive Fastener: Bolts, Nuts, Pins, Screws and Spring. Automotive Electronic Component: Condenser/ Capacitor, Inductor/ Coil, Magnetic Contactors/ Circuit Breakers, ESD Protection Components, Insulating Materials, Directive RoHS Compatible Parts/ Materials, Thermal Design Components(Heater Control Parts), Radiator Boards/ Materials,Connector, Cable and Sensor.

Show banner: 

ASEAN’s Most Comprehensive Exhibition on Automotive Parts Manufacturing Technology

The advent of EV is presenting changes and challenges to auto-part makers. It is very important that the community comes together to discuss how to tackle the challenges and prepare for the future. “Automotive Manufacturing 2023” is designed to be the most focused industrial gathering where the industrialists will not only meet providers of over 250 brands of automotive parts manufacturing technologies, equipment, materials, testing and more, but will also meet with industry leaders and peers to learn from each other in seminars and networking opportunities at the most comprehensive event of the industry in ASEAN. As a part of “Manufacturing Expo,” ASEAN’s leading machinery and technology for manufacturing and supporting industries consisting of five specializing events displaying plastics, mold and die, auto-parts, industrial automation, and surface and coatings technologies welcoming over 85,000 participants, “Automotive Manufacturing” will be the place to be for auto-part makers who want to add more horsepower into their businesses to be ready for the future.

Show Contact

item.title: GFT 2023
item.description:
Dates: 
Jun 21, 2023 - Jun 24, 2023
Opening hours: 
10:00-18.00 hrs
Venue: 
BITEC - Bangkok International Trade & Exhibition Centre
Location address: 
88 Bangna-Trad Road, Bangna
Country: 
Thailand
Organizer: 
RX Tradex
Show URL: 
https://www.gftexpo.com/
Number of exhibitors: 
50
Major exhibits: 

Manufacturers and distributors of garment and textiles manufacturing machinery, technologies, equipment, and materials on : Sewing, Embroidery, Laser Cut, Heat Transfer, Printing, Conveyor hanging Systems, Barcode Packaging, Printing Ribbon, Printing & Finishing, Knitting, Textile Yarn, Spinning, Weaving, Accessories

Show banner: 

Sourcing Platform for Manufacturing Technology, Functional Textiles, Accessories, and OEM Serving Garment and Fashion Industry

Changes in the garment and textile industry, be it the technologies or consumer demands, are creating new patterns of the industry’s modus operandi and growth opportunities. At GFT, over 15,000 manufacturers as well as designers and fashion start-ups will discover the shifts and new ways of achieving their dreams from a collection of garment and textile manufacturing technologies — from sewing, printing, embroidering, to functional textile and OEM services — by over 150 international brands. GFT’s thought-provoking conference sessions and special activities will inspire the creativity and passion of the participants who will also discover quality materials and sourcing services, get updated on latest trends, and expand business networks with industry leaders and peers. GFT will be the only annual industry gathering that will help you create a new pattern of business growth and embroider new ideas for the future. Come sew your pattern of success together at GFT 2023.

Show Contact
Title:

item.title: Assembly & Automation Technology 2023
item.description:
Dates: 
Jun 21, 2023 - Jun 24, 2023
Opening hours: 
10.00-18.00
Venue: 
BITEC (Bangkok International Trade Exhibition Center)
Location address: 
88 Bangna-Trad Road(KM.1), Bangna, Bangkok 10260
Country: 
Thailand
Organizer: 
RX Tradex
Show URL: 
https://www.assemblytechexpo.com
Number of exhibitors: 
N/A
Major exhibits: 

Assembly Technology: Automation, Assembly & Handling System, Assembly Conveying Technology, Robotics System, Artificial Intelligent. Electrical System: Accumulators, Generators and Alternate Power Supplier, Inverter, Service Panel & Distribution, Transformers Wiring, Circuitry & Conduit, Controls and Sensors, and Industrial Energy Efficiency. Drive & Motion: Fluid Power (Air Dryers, Lubricators, Compressors, Catalytic, Conductors, Actuators, Contamination, Pneumatic System, Filter, Filtration, Pumps & Valves and Hose & Tube, Seals & Sealing Technology, Hydrulic System, Vacuum Technology, and Hydraulic Fluids), Power Transmission (Bearing, Convertors and Components, Clutches and Brakes, Coupling and U-Joints, Gear & Wheel, Motor Drives, Linear Motion, and Power Transmission Accessories). Information Technology: Barcode System, Tracking Systems, Balance & Scale System, Quality Control Technology, Testing & Inspection System, Consultancy & Training, HMI Visualization, Networking Technology, and Software & Service, ERP Software, IoT: Internet of Thing, Data Analytics, Cloud Computing, Cyber Security, and System Integration. Material Handling: Forklift , Handlift, Racks, Shelf Pallet, Packing Product, Hoist & Crane, and Logistic & Storage System. Safety & Security: Industrial Safety, Electrical Safety, and Workstation Equipment. Others: Smart City, Future Factory, Field Robotics, Medical Robotics, and Smart Homes.

Show banner: 

ASEAN’s Most Comprehensive Exhibition on Industrial Automation Systems & Solutions and Assembly Technology

“Assembly & Automation Technology 2023” is where manufacturing and supporting industries will be getting closer
to become smart factories and how they transform how products are made in the digital age. As ASEAN’s Most Comprehensive Exhibition on Industrial Automation Systems & Solutions and Assembly Technology,

Assembly & Automation Technology will feature latest industrial automation and robotics technology from over 475 brands. A part of “Manufacturing Expo,” ASEAN’s leading machinery and technology for manufacturing and supporting industries consisting of five specializing events displaying plastics, mold and die, auto-parts, industrial automation, and surface and coatings technologies welcoming over 50,000 participants; and complete with seminars and networking opportunities, “Assembly & Automation Technology” will be the annual gathering where industrialists including System Integrators empowered with what they need to embark into the 4.0 era with confidence.
